children.value: Creativity and collective spirit must go on!
We decided to adapt our installation so we can keep exhibiting during lockdown.
and run The Live Drawing Project from your window!
We exhibit every Sunday evening at 9pm.
Would you like to join us next Sunday? Take out your video projector and fill this form:
